i1.name: Bop 'n' Block
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Periodically, '''Yuumi's''' next [[basic attack]] against an enemy {{tip|champion}} becomes {{tip|unstoppable basic attack|unstoppable}}, gains {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' range}} and becomes a {{tip|projectile|non-projectile}}. This attack restores {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|25 to 100}}|mana}} {{as|(+ 8% '''maximum''' mana)}} {{sti|{{as|mana}}}} and grants her a {{pp|60+10*(x-1) for 3; then +15*x for 4; then +20*x for 7; then + 30*x}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{tip|shield}} that lasts until it is broken.
While {{ai|You and Me!|Yuumi|attached}}, the shield transfers to her ''Anchor''.
i1.notes:
* This ability will apply to a basic attack already in flight, but will not augment it into a non-projectile.
* ''Bop 'n' Block'' will not proc if the attack is {{tip|dodged}} or '''Yuumi''' misses the attack while {{tip|blind|blinded}}. It will proc even if the attack is {{tip|blocked}}.
* Although the shield doesn't expire, it will never stack with itself.
* Considering '''Yuumi's''' {{as|'''base''' mana}}, ''Bop 'n' Block's ''mana restore is increased by '''at least''' {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|({{ccd|Yuumi|mp_base}}+{{ccd|Yuumi|mp_lvl}}*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1)))*0.08}}|mana}}.

q1.name: Prowling Projectile
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yuumi''' fires an errant missile in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy hit.
If the missile is in flight for 1 second, it deals increased {{as|magic damage}}, and {{tip|slow|slows}} enemy {{tip|champions}} struck by 20% for 1 second.

While {{ai|You and Me!|Yuumi|attached}}, '''Yuumi''' instead directs the trajectory of the missile using the cursor for up to 2 seconds before fizzling, during which she and the ''Anchor'' can see the effective range. This cannot be done while channeling {{ai|Final Chapter|Yuumi}}.
q1.notes: * ''Prowling Projectile'' can be buffered {{fd|0.5}} seconds before it comes off cooldown.

w1.name: You and Me!
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} The ''Anchor'' gains either a flat and percentage amount of their {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}} or a flat and percentage amount of their {{sti|{{as|ability power}}}}, based on whichever was initially higher. The percentage '''bonus''' of ''You and Me!'' also benefits from its flat '''bonus'''.

'''Yuumi''' then gains flat {{tip|adaptive force}} plus an amount based on a percentage of the ''Anchor's'' '''current''' {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}} or {{as|ability power}}, whichever is higher. Additionally, '''Yuumi''' starts with a point in ''You and Me!'' and {{ai|Prowling Projectile|Yuumi}} instead has 6 ranks.

{{sbc|Active:}} After a {{fd|0.25}}-second {{tip|channel}}, '''Yuumi''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target {{tt|allied champion|The Anchor}} and {{tip|Attached|attaches}} to them. While attached, '''Yuumi''' follows her ''Anchor's'' movement, is {{tip|untargetable}} (except from {{tip|turrets}} and in-flight {{tip|projectile|projectiles}} [[unit-targeted|targeting]] her), and casts her spells from the ''Anchor's'' position. The cooldown starts ticking down upon completing the {{tip|channel}}. ''You and Me!'' can be recast after {{fd|0.5}} seconds of the attachment.
'''''Yuumi''' will be {{tip|knockdown|knocked down}} by any {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} crowd control during the dash.''

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Yuumi''' can switch her ''Anchor'' at no cooldown, and will ''detach'' automatically if her ''Anchor'' dies or under {{tt|certain circumstances|In the notes below}}. If recast without a valid target, '''Yuumi''' will ''detach'' from her ''Anchor'' and dash 250 units in the target direction, putting the ability on cooldown.
w1.notes:
* The ability name for the recast is ''Change of Plan''.
*''You and Me!'' does not count as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{nie|Spellblade}}, charging {{ii|Spellbinder}}, and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
**{{ci|Kassadin}} cannot gain a stack for {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}} while '''Yuumi''' is {{tip|untargetable}}.
* '''Yuumi''' can channel the {{ii|Eye of the Herald}} while attached.
* The {{as|ability power}} multiplier is '''{{tip|stacks additively|additive}}''' with other {{as|ability power}} multipliers, like from {{ii|Rabadon's Deathcap}} or {{bi|Dragon Slayer|Infernal Might}}. 
* The {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}} multiplier is '''{{tip|stacks additively|additive}}''' with other sources of {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}} multipliers, like from {{ai|Unseen Predator|Rengar}} and is '''{{tip|stacks multiplicatively|multiplicative}}''' with {{as|'''total''' attack damage}} multipliers, like from {{ai|Whisper|Jhin}} or {{bi|Dragon Slayer|Infernal Might}}.
* '''Yuumi''' will automatically detach in the following circumstances:
** When her ''Anchor'' starts a {{si|Teleport}} channel.
** After the ''Anchor'' completes a {{si|Recall}} channel.
** Entering {{tip|resurrection}}.
** Her ''Anchor'' is sent to the {{ai|Realm of Death|Mordekaiser}}.
** She is pulled by {{ai|Fate's Call|Kalista}}.
* The {{tip|dash}} has a maximum following range. If her target is too far away before the attachment, the ''dash'' is interrupted and ''You and Me!'' goes on cooldown.
* While attached to the ''Anchor'', '''Yuumi''' is considered in being at her ''Anchor's'' position, regardless of where she is visually placed near them. For example, {{tip|turret}} shots will appear as if they were hitting the ''Anchor'', but in reality they're actually hitting '''Yuumi'''.
* Her {{tip|monster}} aggression transfers to the ''Anchor''.
* Enemies gain an assist on '''Yuumi''' if they damaged the ''Anchor''.
* '''Yuumi''' gains assists on champion {{tip|takedown|takedowns}} from her ''Anchor''.
* '''Yuumi''' will also {{tip|vanish}} if her ''Anchor'' does.
* '''Yuumi''' will also become {{tip|stealth|stealthed}} if her ''Anchor'' does, and can cast her own abilities without breaking the stealth.
* If '''Yuumi''' is on the blue team, she will remain attached on the southwest side; if '''Yuumi''' is on the red team, she will remain on the northeast. While channeling {{ai|Final Chapter|Yuumi}}, she will be behind her ''Anchor''.
* '''Yuumi''' can dash to targetable {{tip|zombie state}} allies (currently only {{cai|Glory in Death|Sion}}), but she cannot stay attached for long.
* '''Yuumi''' doesn't ''detach'' instantly when her ''Anchor'' dies. There's a small grace period in which she can recast ''You and Me!'' to attach to another champion without the {{tip|channel}}.
* The [[Summoner|player's]] screen will briefly flash red if '''Yuumi''' is affected by a {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} or {{tip|ground|grounding}} effect, or if she forcibly detaches from her ''Anchor''.
* The ''Anchor's'' [[health bar]] will have a different frame to indicate the ''attached'' status:
[[File: Yuumi Health Bar.png|200px|center]]
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Yuumi''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|channel|attack=false|move=false|cast=false|items=false, true|spells=true, false, false, false, false|interrupts=death, ground, root, silence}}
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Yuumi''' is {{tip|attached}}:
{{ct|move=false|cast=true|attack=false|items=true, true, true, false|spells=true, false, false, false, false|interrupts=death}}

e1.name: Zoomies
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yuumi''' {{tip|heals}} herself and gains {{as|15%|movement speed}} {{as|(+ 10% per 100 AP)}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed|ms}}}} and {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 3 seconds.
While {{ai|You and Me!|Yuumi|attached}}, the ''Anchor'' is affected by the ability instead.
e1.notes: * Considering '''Yuumi's''' {{as|'''base''' mana}}, ''Zoomies' ''mana cost is increased by '''at least''' {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|({{ccd|Yuumi|mp_base}}+{{ccd|Yuumi|mp_lvl}}*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1)))*0.15}}|mana}}.

r1.name: Final Chapter
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yuumi''' and ''Book'' {{tip|channel}} for {{fd|3.5}} seconds, launching 7 waves in the target direction over the duration, each dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit in their path. Enemy {{tip|champions}} hit take only 50% damage from subsequent waves, and when struck with three waves, they are {{tip|root|rooted}} for {{fd|1.75}} seconds, this can only occur once per target.

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Magic Damage Per Wave|{{ap|60 to 100}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}|Reduced Damage Per Wave|{{ap|60*0.5 to 100*0.5}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}}|Maximum Champion Damage|{{ap|60*4 to 100*4}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}|Maximum Non-Champion Damage|{{ap|60*7 to 100*7}} {{as|(+ 140% AP)}}}}
